title: Client is messed up plz help me!
body: Whenever i type to my friends, it gets sent up to the top left hand of the screen. rito plz{{sticker:sg-lux-2}}

replies.body:
Try running a **client repair** through settings (the gear icon top right) > Initiate Full Repair.

If that doesn't work try **reinstalling the game** with the [Hextech Repair Tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202539040-Reinstalling-League-of-Legends).

If that still doesn't fix your issue **submit a ticket** to [Player Support](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new)
